channel.title: Lists and datasets on open-archaeo
channel.description: Recent content in Lists and datasets on open-archaeo

item.title: 3D libraries of ships
item.description: A 3D library of ancient (classical era) ships.

item.title: 3d-ceramics
item.description: 3d models of archaeological ceramics.

item.title: A bibliography of public archaeology and archaeological heritage management in the Mediterranean
item.description: A collection of references about public archaeology and archaeological heritage management in/from the Mediterranean.

item.title: ABC of Archaeobotanical Open Science
item.description: A list of terms related to open archaeobotanical science.

item.title: ABM tutorials
item.description: A collection of tutorial on agent-based modelling for archaeologists.

item.title: aca_data_collection
item.description: collection of archaeological data for training purposes.

item.title: aDRAC
item.description: The Archive des datations radiocarbones d’Afrique centrale (archive for radiocarbon datings from Central Africa, aDRAC) provides a catalogue of available radiocarbon dates from Central Africa. The data cover published radiocarbon dates and essential metadata for each date as well as available references.

item.title: AIDA
item.description: Dataset of 4,010 radiocarbon dates from Italy from Late Mesolithic until Late Antiquity.

item.title: ancient-ceramic-kilns
item.description: GeoJSON files for ceramic kilns of the ancient world, no chronological/spatial boundaries

item.title: AncientMetagenomeDir
item.description: Repository containing lists of all published ancient metagenome samples (and related).

item.title: Archaeological Ethics Database
item.description: Brings together sources on archaeological ethics in a single place for the use of students, researchers, and professional archaeologists.

item.title: archaeology
item.description: A directory of GitHub projects by OR for archaeologists.

item.title: archeoViz Portal
item.description: An R Shiny application to gather and map datasets visualised using the archeoViz application

item.title: Arran
item.description: A benchmark dataset for automated detection of archaeological sites on LiDAR data.

item.title: AtlantGIS
item.description: Faked GIS-Datasets, simulating an island in the Atlantic for educational purposes in using GIS in archaeology

item.title: Bibliographic Database of African Scholarship on African Archaeology
item.description: An open-access database of African archaeology publications by African and Afrodescendant scholars.

item.title: binford
item.description: Datasets used in Binford’s 2001 book “Constructing Frames of Reference: An Analytical Method for Archaeological Theory Building Using Ethnographic and Environmental Data Sets

item.title: c14-laboratory-code
item.description: List of all past and present radiocarbon laboratory codes known to have been used in published references.

item.title: CalPal-Database
item.description: CalPal 14C-Database created by Bernhard Weninger (UniversitÃ¤t zu KÃ¶ln) as part of the CalPal software package. This repository serves as an interface to access the data more easily.

item.title: caribbean-14C
item.description: A compilation of anthropogenic radiocarbon dates for the Caribbean region.

item.title: Classical and ancient Linked Open Data
item.description: A list of linked open data repositories relating to classics and ancient history.

item.title: Corallium Fabrica
item.description: Set of 3D models of coral skeletons, which may be used as a reference collection.

item.title: Crop_Origins_Phylo
item.description: Repository of Crop Origins database and Phylo Food phylogeny.

item.title: ctv-archaeology
item.description: This CRAN Task View contains a list of packages useful for scientific work in Archaeology.

item.title: Day of Archaeology Archive
item.description: Archive of content shared during the annual Day of Archaeology from 2011-2017.

item.title: dayofarchaeology
item.description: export of posts from dayofarchaeology.com

item.title: Digital Encyclopedia of Archaeologists
item.description: A webpage containing brief biographical information about some iconic archaeologists.

item.title: DObsiSS
item.description: The Database of Obsidian Sourcing Studies

item.title: evoarchdata
item.description: Datasets from studies of cultural evolution in Archaeology

item.title: folio
item.description: Datasets for teaching quantitative approaches and modeling in archaeology and paleontology. This package provides several types of data related to broad topics (cultural evolution, radiocarbon dating, paleoenvironments, etc.), which can be used to illustrate statistical methods in the classroom (multivariate data analysis, compositional data analysis, diversity measurement, etc.).

item.title: folio
item.description: Datasets for Teaching Archaeology and Palaeontology.

item.title: GCD
item.description: Global Charcoal Database

item.title: Git-to-the-Point
item.description: An open call to edit and revise current typological assignments and attributes associated with diagnostic artifacts found across the National Forests and Grasslands in Texas (NFGT).

item.title: gitMuseum
item.description: A repository listing Museums active on GitHub, written in Rstats.

item.title: GlobaLID-database
item.description: Facilitates the reconstruction of raw material provenances with lead isotopes.

item.title: gorbit
item.description: Making the freely available and excellent Orbis data just a little bit more easy to use.

item.title: IntChron
item.description: An indexing service for chronological information. Information can be viewed as webpages or downloaded as data files in different formats.

item.title: Isaac's List of FOSS tools for academics... and what to use them for!
item.description: An annotated list of open source tools for academics.

item.title: IsoArcH
item.description: Open access and collaborative isotope database for bioarcheological samples.

item.title: Isotope-Visualisation
item.description: Resources relevant to visualisation of isotopic results

item.title: italy-3d-amphitheaters
item.description: 3D amphitheatres.

item.title: levant-zooarch
item.description: Table of faunal analyses from archaeological sites in the Levant.

item.title: Map Files
item.description: This page presents an ever growing collection of resources for digital mapping.

item.title: map-of-Ancient-Egypt
item.description: Known pyramids of Ancient Egypt using python + OpenStreetMap.

item.title: Mastodon-Archaeology
item.description: Simple web app that helps to bulk follow archaeologists on the FOSS microblogging service Mastodon.

item.title: Material Sources for Early Islam and Late Antique Near East
item.description: A list of resources and materials for research on the history of Early Islam and the Late Antique Near East.

item.title: NASSA-modules
item.description: The modular library of the Network for Agent-based modelling of Socio-ecological systems in Archaeology

item.title: NERD
item.description: Dataset of 10,647 radiocarbon dates from the Near East from the Late Pleistocene until the Late Holocene (ca. 14 - 2 kya BP).

item.title: OHM Data Index
item.description: The data index considers a collection of research areas that broadly stroke an idea of the level of completeness in the knowledge of a given period and timeframe.

item.title: Open Access Archaeology
item.description: OpenAccessArchaeology.org is dedicated to helping people discover and use Open Access resources in the field of Archaeology.

item.title: open-archaeo
item.description: A list of open source archaeological software and resources.

item.title: OpenArchaeology.net
item.description: Open Archaeology hosts a number of sub-projects that while functional at a component level are intended to interoperate creating a complete AIS (Archaeological Information System), including the components necessary to manage the organisation carrying out the archaeology.

item.title: p3k14c
item.description: Global archaeological radiocarbon dataset

item.title: pe-dictionary
item.description: Proto-Elamite sign list.

item.title: photogrammetry_datasets
item.description: This is a collection of datasets for photogrammetry.

item.title: Pofatu
item.description: An open-access database for geochemical sourcing of archaeological materials.

item.title: Potential datasets for PhD projects
item.description: A Google Doc with different archaeological and anthropological datasets and resources for students who need to make changes to their project due to COVID-19

item.title: pta_data
item.description: An open access digital archive of antique Christian texts.

item.title: R-Scripts
item.description: This contains a set of data about human mobility, subsistance, population, and environmental productivity derived from the Standard Cross Cultural Sample

item.title: ramphs
item.description: Roman amphitheater data as R package

item.title: rapanui-radiocarbon
item.description: A repository of radiocarbon data for Rapa Nui.

item.title: roman-amphitheaters
item.description: A dataset of Roman amphitheaters.

item.title: roman-amphitheaters
item.description: A dataset and discussion relating to Roman amphitheaters

item.title: roman-empire
item.description: Map of the Roman Empire made with vector tiles

item.title: roman-maps
item.description: These are geojson files relevant to Roman history. Initially they are all derived from the Ancient World Mapping Center’s set of CC-BY-NC licensed shapefiles.

item.title: Roman-material-database-info
item.description: An interactive database of construction materials used in antiquity meant to enable creation of 3D and virtual reality (VR) models of historic structures.

item.title: rorbium
item.description: Orbis data as an R package

item.title: Roundup of Resources on Ancient Geography
item.description: Included in the following list are links to digital project dealing with geography and the ancient world.

item.title: rxpand
item.description: Radiocarbon dates for the spread of farming and ceramics in tropical South America.

item.title: swapdata
item.description: A collection of archaeological datasets and tools related to the prehistory of Southwest Asia.

item.title: tavo-a27
item.description: Ancient animal occurrence data from Uerpmann 1987, The Ancient Distribution of Ungulate Mammals in the Middle East, TAVO A27.

item.title: The ABM in Archaeology Bibliography
item.description: A selected yet comprehensive list of literature and resources on Agent Based Models (ABM) in Archaeology.

item.title: The AWOL Index
item.description: This publication systematically describes ancient-world information resources on the world-wide web. The bibliographic data presented herein has been programmatically extracted from the content of AWOL - The Ancient World Online (ISSN 2156-2253) and formatted in accordance with a structured data model.

item.title: Tools for Quantitative Archaeology
item.description: Keith KintighTools for Quantitative Archaeology TFQA, is a package of more than 45 PC programs developed to satisfy several unusual analytical needs of archaeologists.
